What's the weakest character in the game of gladiator?  Yea, I'm
serious.  Which character(s) are lacking the most in the game of
gladiator?

* * * 

I managed to beat a level 522 archmage at slaughter level in about
10-15 minutes at speed setting 11 with my best mage, while I had time
frozen.

Of course, I had to cheat to keep myself from running out of mana
while using warp space attack.

To that end, I'm not even sure if it's even theoritically possible to
beat Tevilido's "To the Ocean Without a Boat" without cheating or
altering the scenario.
